title: when I open Google photos on my laptop 'Library' pics are non available, as they are on phone. help?
content:
I took a screen shot of my phone screen, and the image is stored in Library-screenshots on my phone. When I want to look at my photos on my laptop in googlephotos, the 'Library' is not available and I can't find the screen shot in any of the available places, even in Photos.
I want to attach the screen shot to an email sent from laptop. Can't figure out how to do it. (Not got email set-up on my phone.) Can anyone advise? Thanks
